text: I pochemu zhe nam ne uverovat' tol'ko v Allakha Yedinogo, - dobavlyayut oni, - i v tu istinu, kotoruyu On nisposlal Mukhammadu - da blagoslovit yego Allakh i privetstvuyet! - i prishedshuyu k nam, raz my zhelayem, chtoby Gospod' vvol nas v ray s lyud'mi pravednymi, blagochestivymi, vershashchimi dobrodeyaniya
